name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Rust Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in secure system design and decentralized systems leveraging **Rust**, **Blockchain Fundamentals**, and **Smart Contract Development**. Proficient in crafting solutions that utilize **Cryptographic Techniques**, such as **Asynchronous Programming** and **Secure Multiparty Computation**, ensuring robust security and integrity for web3 applications. I am highly knowledgeable in consensus protocols and decentralized identity solutions, enabling the creation of decentralized applications (dApps) with verifiable credentials (VCs).

Additionally, I have extensive experience with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, utilizing frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI** for full-stack projects. My cloud expertise spans **Azure** and **AWS**, and I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics. My commitment to compliance is reflected in my familiarity with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I also have hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines, which I complement with solid practices in CI/CD automation.
